name: Paul & Tita
description:
Paul & Tita is a intense co-op top down shooter where you need to help the avocado couple to cross the forest, but watch out! Other fruits and veggies are in your way!

They are the same avocado so they only have one nut and they share their life! Shoot your nut but pay attention to which character has it next!

Collect power ups to help yourself and avoid the other fruits attacks!

This game is designed for 2 players but there's a 1 player mode where you control both characters. It's a hard challenge! Will you give it a try? You can do it!

___

Hey! My name is Noar, welcome to my second game, it's a co-op top down shooter with a twist! Can you handle it?

Hope you enjoy this game. It was done in almos 2 months on Unity. You can watch the development progress in my channel.

Thanks for playing!

__ 

CONTROLS (1 Player)

WASD: Move Paul

ARROWS: Move Tita

SPACE: Shoot the nut!

__

CONTROLS (2 Players)

Player 1:

WASD: Move Paul

SPACE: Shoot the nut!

Player 2:

ARROWS: Move Tita

ENTER: Shoot the nut!
